snippet: The Federal Reserve is appealing a decision involving debit card transactions fees. | Bloomberg L.P. said it was making changes to its journalism operation. | The bailout of Cyprus has given Russians control of a bank there. | To build under his home...
abstract: The Federal Reserve is appealing a decision involving debit card transactions fees. | Bloomberg L.P. said it was making changes to its journalism operation. | The bailout of Cyprus has given Russians control of a bank there. | To build under his home in London, a hedge fund manager must pay a hefty fee.

headline.main: A Test of Courts' Power on Financial Rules
